headline: Expeditors International (EXPD): Assessing Valuation After Analyst Upgrades and Earnings Outlook Boost
summary: Expeditors International of Washington has caught investors’ attention this month, drawing praise for its top Zacks Rank as well as a notable boost in its consensus earnings outlook. The company’s recent momentum stands out in the transportation sector. See our latest analysis for Expeditors International of Washington.
